serverless.title: Serverless Complexity Trap

serverless.narrative: Serverless sounds magical until you're debugging cold starts at 3 AM. Your 'simple' function architecture now has 47 Lambda functions, each with different timeout configurations, and your AWS bill just hit $8,000/month for a product that could run on a $200 VPS. When AWS Lambda has an outage (and it will), your entire product goes dark.
serverless.mathJustification: Cold starts will kill your user experience, and vendor lock-in will kill your negotiating power.
